name: Ascension
description: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

name: Band of Thieves II
description: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

name: Binary Airdrop
description: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat. Gain 1 random item components.

name: Calculated Loss
description: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

name: Celestial Blessing I
description: Your units heal for 10% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 200 Health.

name: Celestial Blessing II
description: Your units heal for 15% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

name: Celestial Blessing III
description: Your units heal for 25% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 400 Health.

name: Clear Mind
description: If you have no champions on your bench at the end of a player combat round, gain 3 experience points.

name: Cybernetic Implants I
description: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and 10% bonus Attack Damage.

name: Cybernetic Implants II
description: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 20% bonus Attack Damage.

name: Cybernetic Implants III
description: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and 30% bonus Attack Damage.

name: Exiles I
description: Your units that start combat with no adjacent allies gain a 25% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

name: Exiles II
description: Your units that start combat with no adjacent allies gain a 35% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

name: Stand United I
description: Your units gain 1.5% Attack Damage and 1.5 Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

name: Stand United II
description: Your units gain 2.5% Attack Damage and 2.5 Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

name: Stand United III
description: Your units gain 3.5% Attack Damage and 3.5 Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

name: Tri Force III
description: Your Tier 3 champions gain 200 Health, 25 starting Mana, and 25% Attack Speed.

name: Featherweights II
description: Your Tier 1 and 2 champions gain 30% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

name: Featherweights III
description: Your Tier 1 and 2 champions gain 50% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

name: First Aid Kit I
description: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 25%.

name: New Recruit
description: Gain +1 maximum team size.

name: Golden Ticket
description: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 50% chance to gain a free refresh.

name: High End Shopping
description: Champions appear in your Shop as if you were 1 level higher. Gain 3 gold.

name: Hustler
description: You earn no interest, but gain 3 gold at the start of every player combat round.

name: Component Grab Bag
description: Gain 3 random item components.

name: Item Grab Bag II
description: Gain 2 random completed items and 2 Reforgers.

name: Makeshift Armor I
description: Your units without items equipped gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Makeshift Armor II
description: Your units without items equipped gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Level Up!
description: When you buy experience points, gain an additional 3. You can now reach level 10.

name: Knife's Edge I
description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25% Attack Damage.

name: Knife's Edge II
description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35% Attack Damage.

name: Knife's Edge III
description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 55% Attack Damage.

name: Metabolic Accelerator
description: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health after a PvP round.

name: Pandora's Items
description: Gain a random component. At the start of each round, items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

name: Portable Forge
description: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

name: Rich Get Richer
description: Gain 12 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

name: Salvage Bin
description: Gain a random completed item now, and a component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

name: March of Progress
description: Gain 2 experience points now, and bonus experience points equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

name: True Twos
description: Gain a random 2-star Tier 1 champion and a random 2-star Tier 2 champion.

name: Sunfire Board
description: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 10% of their maximum Health over 20 seconds and reduce healing received by 33%.

name: Phony Frontline
description: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

name: Wise Spending
description: When you refresh your Shop, gain 2 experience point(s).

name: Thrill of the Hunt I
description: Your units heal 350 Health on kill.

name: Thrill of the Hunt II
description: Your units heal 550 Health on kill.

name: Ancient Archives I
description: Gain 1 Tome of Traits and 4 gold.

name: Trade Sector
description: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

name: Built Different II
description: Your units with no Traits active gain 190-355 Health and 40-70% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

name: Built Different III
description: Your units with no Traits active gain 250-600 Health and 45-80% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

name: Windfall
description: Gain 25 gold.

name: Woodland Charm
description: Your highest Health champion is cloned. You cannot equip items on the clone.

name: Battlemage I
description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Armor and 15 Ability Power.

name: Battlemage II
description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Armor and 25 Ability Power.

name: Recombobulator
description: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 Tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

name: Radiant Relics
description: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 5 unique Radiant items.

name: Electrocharge I
description: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 30-90 (based on current Stage) magic damage  to nearby enemies (1 second cooldown).

name: Electrocharge II
description: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage  to nearby enemies (1 second cooldown).

name: Electrocharge III
description: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 115-235 (based on current Stage) magic damage  to nearby enemies (1 second cooldown).

name: Second Wind I
description: After 40 seconds of combat, your units heal 10% of their missing Health.

name: Second Wind II
description: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 60% of their missing Health.

name: Jeweled Lotus
description: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 20% Critical Strike Chance.

name: Verdant Veil
description: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 20 seconds of combat and gain 15% bonus Attack Speed.

name: Cybernetic Uplink I
description: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

name: Cybernetic Uplink II
description: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2.5 Mana per second.

name: Cybernetic Uplink III
description: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3.5 Mana per second.

name: Cybernetic Shell I
description: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and 30 Armor.

name: Cybernetic Shell II
description: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 40 Armor.

name: Cybernetic Shell III
description: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and 60 Armor.

name: Luden's Echo I
description: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 35-80 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

name: Luden's Echo II
description: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

name: Luden's Echo III
description: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 90-210 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

name: Golden Gifts II
description: Gain 2 golden and 4 gray loot orb(s).

name: Featherweights I
description: Your Tier 1 and 2 champions gain 20% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

name: Future Sight II
description: Know who you will fight next. Gain a Radiant Zephyr.

name: Tri Force II
description: Your Tier 3 champions gain 125 Health, 15 starting Mana, and 15% Attack Speed.

name: Future Sight I
description: Know who you will fight next. Gain a Zephyr.

name: Battlemage III
description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35 Armor and 35 Ability Power.

name: Tri Force I
description: Your Tier 3 champions gain 75 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.

name: The Golden Egg
description: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 11 turns. Victorious player combats accelerate the hatch timer by an additional turn.

name: Three's Company
description: Gain 4 random Tier 3 champions.

name: Tiny Titans
description: Your Tactician heals 30 Health, grows larger, and has 130 maximum Health.

name: Double Trouble II
description: When you field exactly 2 copies of a non-threat champion, they both gain 33% Attack Damage and 33 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

name: Double Trouble III
description: When you field exactly 2 copies of a non-threat champion, they both gain 44% Attack Damage and 44 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

name: Item Grab Bag I
description: Gain 1 random completed item.

name: Think Fast
description: Shop refreshes are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free shops. Gain 3 gold.

name: Combat Training II
description: Your champions permanently gain 2% Attack Damage every time they kill an enemy. Champions start with 4% bonus Attack Damage.

name: Ancient Archives II
description: Gain 2 Tome of Traits and 8 gold.

name: Cruel Pact
description: Buying XP costs 6 Health instead of gold. Heal 3 Health before each player combat.

name: Pandora's Bench
description: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

name: Cluttered Mind
description: If your bench is full at the end of a player combat round, gain 3 experience points. Gain 4 random Tier 1 champions.

name: Axiom Arc II
description: Your units gain 30 Mana on kill.

name: AFK
description: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 18 gold.

name: Urf's Grab Bag II
description: Gain 1 Spatula and 3 random item component(s).

name: Living Forge
description: Gain a random Ornn artifact now and after every 10 player combats.

name: Band of Thieves I
description: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

name: Lategame Specialist
description: When you reach Level 9, gain 44 gold.

name: Preparation I
description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 25 Health, 3% Attack Damage, and 3 Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

name: Cursed Crown
description: Gain +2 maximum team size, but take 100% increased player damage.

name: Big Friend I
description: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1600 Health take 7% less damage for the rest of combat.

name: Last Stand
description: The first time you would be eliminated or reduced to 1 Health, instead remain alive. After this effect triggers, your units permanently gain 180 Health, 18 Armor and Magic Resist, and 18% Omnivamp.

name: Rich Get Richer+
description: Gain 20 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

name: First Aid Kit II
description: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 35%.

name: Windfall+
description: Gain 35 gold.

name: Windfall++
description: Gain 45 gold.

name: Big Friend II
description: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1600 Health take 10% less damage for the rest of combat.

name: Preparation II
description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35 Health, 4% Attack Damage, and 4 Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

name: Preparation III
description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 7% Attack Damage, and 7 Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

name: The Golden Egg
description: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 6 turns. Victorious player combats accelerate the hatch timer by an additional turn.

name: AFK
description: You cannot perform actions for the next 2 rounds. Afterwards, gain 15 gold.

name: Component Grab Bag+
description: Gain 3 random item components.

name: Urf's Grab Bag II+
description: Gain 1 Spatula and 3 random item component(s).

name: Preparation I
description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35 Health, 4% Attack Damage, and 4 Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 3 times.

name: Preparation II
description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 6% Attack Damage, and 6 Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 3 times.

name: Preparation III
description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 70 Health, 9% Attack Damage, and 9 Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 3 times.

name: Living Forge
description: Gain a random Ornn artifact now and after every 4 player combats.

name: Trade Sector+
description: Gain a free Shop refresh every round. Gain 10 gold now.

name: Scoped Weapons I
description: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +2 Attack Range and 12% Attack Speed.

name: Lucky Gloves
description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

name: Consistency
description: Gain double win and loss streak gold.

name: Birthday Present
description: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1).

name: Threat Level: Maximum
description: Combat start: Threats gain 66 maximum Health for every Threat champion on your board.

name: Armored-dillo
description: Gain a Rammus. When you field him, your team gains 40 Armor, doubled for himself.

name: Impact Velocity
description: Gain an Aurelion Sol. Your strongest Aurelion Sol's Ability <TFTKeyword>Stuns</TFTKeyword> enemies hit for 1.75 seconds.

name: Voidmother
description: Gain a Bel'Veth. Combat start: Your strongest Bel'Veth creates 2 Voidspawns with 60% of their normal Health in front of her.

name: Gifted
description: Gain a Nilah. She gains 45 Ability Power. Combat start: Your strongest Nilah grants her nearest ally a temporary copy of one of her normal items.

name: Spread Shot
description: Gain a Vayne. Your strongest Vayne's Ability also fires at 2 other nearby enemies, dealing 44% damage.

name: Reverberation
description: Gain a Riven. Your strongest Riven gains 15 Ability Power and her Ability is also cast on her lowest Health ally.

name: Reconnaissance Team
description: Gain a Kai'Sa. At the start of combat, Your strongest Kai'Sa and her 2 closest allied champions gain 40% Critical Strike Chance and their spells can critically strike.

name: Aim Assist
description: Gain a LeBlanc. For every 3 sigils fired by her Ability, your strongest LeBlanc fires an extra sigil at the lowest Health enemy.

name: Multi-Shot
description: Gain a Kai'Sa. Your strongest Kai'Sa gains 10 Ability Power. Every 2 projectile(s), she fires a bonus attack at a nearby enemy.

name: Spiked Shell
description: Gain a Rammus. When struck by an attack, your strongest Rammus deals magic damage equal to 150% of his Armor to all nearby enemies (once every 2 seconds).

name: Foster Growth
description: Gain a Lulu. When you field her, she and allies holding an item gain 40 Ability Power.

name: Re-Energize
description: Gain a Wukong. When you field him, your team restores 50% of their Mana after their first cast each combat.

name: Laser Focus
description: Gain an Ashe. Your strongest Ashe gains 45% Attack Speed, doubled while her Ability is active.

name: Jubilant Veil
description: Gain a Nilah. Combat start: Your strongest Nilah and her 6 nearest allies gain immunity to crowd control for 30 seconds.

name: Power Grid
description: Gain a Sona. Your strongest Sona gains 10 Ability Power and her Ability fires 1 additional beam.

name: Undercurrent
description: Gain a Sona. Combat start: Your strongest Sona grants her 3 nearest allies 50 Mana.

name: Relentless Assault
description: Gain a Jax. After every 3rd attack, your strongest Jax gains 18% Attack Speed for the rest of combat (this can stack).

name: Into The Night
description: Gain a Vayne and an Edge of Night. When you field her, allies holding Edge of Night gain 35% Attack Speed.

name: Triumphant Return
description: Gain a Riven. Combat start: Your strongest Riven grants herself and adjacent allies a shield for 15 seconds equal to 45% of their maximum Health.

name: The Behemoth
description: Gain an Alistar. Your strongest Alistar has 350 bonus health. His ability now hits all adjacent enemies and deals bonus damage to the main target equal to 25% of his max health.

name: Stubborn
description: Gain an Alistar. Round Start: Your strongest Alistar 50% <TFTKeyword>Shreds</TFTKeyword> all Enemies.

name: Hextech Retribution
description: Gain a Camille. When you field her, your team deals 8% bonus damage, increasing by an additional 5% whenever an ally dies.

name: Adaptive Defensives
description: Gain a Camille. Your strongest Camille gains 20% Attack Damage. The first time she drops below 50% Health, she gains a shield equal to 500% of her Attack Damage.

name: Cleansing Safeguard
description: Gain a Lee Sin. Your strongest Lee Sin's Ability costs 15 less Mana to cast. When he casts, he sheds all negative effects and heals 15% of his missing Health.

name: Invigorate
description: Gain a Lee Sin. When you field him, your team gains 20% Attack Speed, doubled for 4 seconds after being shielded.

name: Rising Spell Force
description: Gain an Ezreal. When your strongest Ezreal casts his Ability, he gains 16% Attack Speed and 16 Ability Power for the rest of combat (this can stack).

name: Raider's Spoils
description: Gain an Ezreal. Combat start: Your strongest Ezreal grants his nearest ally a temporary Artifact for the rest of combat.

name: Unrelenting Force
description: Gain a Vi. When your strongest Vi takes or deals damage, she gains 3% Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist, stacking up to 25 times.

name: Boxing Lessons
description: Gain a Vi. When you field her, your team gains 180 bonus Health.

name: Hold the Line
description: Gain a Rell. Your strongest Rell gains 60 Ability Power and takes 35% less damage.

name: Channeled Ferromancy
description: Gain a Rell. When you field her, your team gains 20 Armor and Magic Resist, and an additional 5 when they cast Abilities (this can stack).

name: Grand Challenge
description: Gain a Fiora. Every 4 attacks on the same unit, your strongest Fiora deals 20% of her maximum health as magic damage, and heals for 9% of her maximum health.

name: Vitality of the Ox
description: Gain a Fiora. When you field her, your team heals 25% of their maximum Health every 10 attacks.

name: League of Draven
description: Gain a Draven. Your strongest Draven has 25% bonus Attack Damage. When he kills an enemy, there is a 35% chance to gain 1 gold.

name: Ruthless Blades
description: Gain a Draven. When you field him, your team gains 75% Critical Strike Chance.

name: Get Excited!
description: Gain a Jinx. Your strongest Jinx gains 30% Attack Speed and Move speed. When she scores a takedown this amount is tripled for 6 seconds.

name: Everyone Goes BOOM!
description: Gain a Jinx. When you field her, your team gains 9% Attack Speed, tripled after the first enemy dies each combat.

name: Rock Solid
description: Gain a Malphite. Your strongest Malphite gains Ability Power equal to 111% of his Armor, and his Ability's Armor duration is increased by 4 seconds.

name: Guardian Spirit
description: Gain a Malphite. When you field him, your team restores 20% of their missing Health when they cast Abilities.

name: Pyromania
description: Gain an Annie. Your strongest Annie's spell is larger and stuns all enemies hit for 2 seconds.

name: Burning Spirit
description: Gain an Annie. When you field her, your team gains 15 Ability Power, tripled while they are below 50% Health.

name: Spirit of the Exile
description: Gain a Yasuo. When you field him, allies who start combat with no adjacent allies gain 22% Attack Speed.

name: Stacks on Stacks
description: Gain a Nasus. Your strongest Nasus has 15% Attack Damage, which increases permanently by 2% when he casts his Ability.

name: Not So Heavy Metal
description: Gain a Mordekaiser. Your strongest Mordekaiser gains 20 Ability Power every 4 seconds.

name: Empowered Reserves
description: Gain a Syndra. When you field her, your team gains 5 Ability Power for each occupied slot on your bench.

name: Perfected Solar Flare
description: Gain a Leona. Your strongest Leona has 40 Ability Power, and her Abilities cost 40 less Mana to cast.

name: Contagious Laughter
description: Gain a Nunu. When you field him, your team gains 15 Ability Power and an additional 10 every 5 seconds.

name: Scarier-crow
description: Gain a Fiddlesticks. Your strongest Fiddlesticks gains Corrupted Souls even if he is no longer dormant, and if he is still dormant after 8 seconds, he casts immediately. FIddlesticks' spell can critically strike.

name: Shiny
description: Gain an Urgot. Your strongest Urgot's Ability has an extra 25% chance to dredge up treasure.

name: Exaggerated Reporting
description: Gain a Janna. Forecaster's effects are increased by 100%.

name: Obliterate
description: Gain a Mordekaiser. Combat start: Your strongest Mordekaiser 20% <TFTKeyword>Shreds</TFTKeyword> and 20% <TFTKeyword>Sunders</TFTKeyword> enemies.

name: Rising Tide
description: Gain an Urgot. Combat start: Your strongest Urgot grants adjacent allies 50% Attack Speed.

name: Eclipse Prime
description: Gain a Leona. When you field her, your team takes 20 less damage.

name: Not In Vain
description: Gain a Syndra. Your strongest Syndra gains 40 starting Mana, and 50% Attack Speed every time an ally dies.

name: Mirror Image
description: Gain a LeBlanc. Combat start: Your strongest LeBlanc duplicates her nearest ally (without items or traits at 99% Health).

name: Steadfast Presence
description: Gain a Poppy. Combat start: Your strongest Poppy grants your team a 325 Health shield.

name: Reign of Anger
description: Gain a Renekton. Your strongest Renekton gains 40% Attack Speed and an extra 5% per 100 missing Health.

name: Cull the Meek
description: Gain a Renekton. When you field him, your team deals 8% bonus damage, tripled against enemies below 50% Health.

name: Soul Eater
description: Gain a Nasus. When you field him, your team heals 275 Health on takedowns.

name: A.D.M.I.N. Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional A.D.M.I.N. Gain a Camille.

name: Anima Squad Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Anima Squad. Gain a Jinx.

name: Destructive Resonance
description: Gain an Ekko. Your strongest Ekko's Ability hits all enemies within 3 hexes and deals 200% increased damage, but no longer slows enemies' Attack Speed.

name: Spellslinger Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Spellslinger. Gain an Annie.

name: Sureshot Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Sureshot. Gain a Sivir.

name: Defender Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Defender. Gain a Rell.

name: Duelist Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Duelist. Gain a Fiora.

name: Gadgeteen Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Gadgeteen. Gain a Poppy.

name: Hacker Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Hacker. Gain a Pyke.

name: Heart Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Heart. Gain a Lee Sin.

name: Mascot Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mascot. Gain a Malphite.

name: Ox Force Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ox Force. Gain a Fiora.

name: Recon Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Recon. Gain an Ezreal.

name: Renegade Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Renegade. Gain a Camille.

name: Star Guardian Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Star Guardian. Gain a Rell.

name: Underground Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Underground. Gain a Vi.

name: Ace Crest
description: Gain an Ace Emblem and a Draven.

name: A.D.M.I.N. Crest
description: Gain an A.D.M.I.N. Emblem and a Blitzcrank.

name: Brawler Crest
description: Gain a Brawler Emblem and a Lee Sin.

name: Spellslinger Crest
description: Gain a Spellslinger Emblem and an Annie.

name: Sureshot Crest
description: Gain a Sureshot Emblem and a Sivir.

name: Defender Crest
description: Gain a Defender Emblem and a Poppy.

name: Duelist Crest
description: Gain a Duelist Emblem and a Yasuo.

name: Mecha: PRIME Crest
description: Gain a Mecha: PRIME Emblem and a Draven.

name: Hacker Crest
description: Gain a Hacker Emblem and a Pyke.

name: Heart Crest
description: Gain a Heart Emblem and a Lee Sin.

name: Mascot Crest
description: Gain a Mascot Emblem and a Malphite.

name: Ox Force Crest
description: Gain an Ox Force Emblem and an Annie.

name: Prankster Crest
description: Gain a Prankster Emblem and a Jinx.

name: Recon Crest
description: Gain a Recon Emblem.

name: Renegade Crest
description: Gain a Renegade Emblem and a Lucian.

name: Star Guardian Crest
description: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem and a Rell.

name: Ace in the Hole
description: Gain an Ace Emblem, a Draven, a Miss Fortune, and a Samira.

name: A.D.M.I.N. Crown
description: Gain an A.D.M.I.N. Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Camille.

name: Brawler Crown
description: Gain a Brawler Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Riven.

name: Sureshot Crown
description: Gain a Sureshot Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Sivir.

name: Spellslinger Crown
description: Gain a Spellslinger Emblem, a Tear of the Goddess, and a Sona.

name: Defender Crown
description: Gain a Defender Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Riven.

name: Duelist Crown
description: Gain a Duelist Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Nilah.

name: Mecha: PRIME Crown
description: Gain a Mecha: PRIME Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Jax.

name: Hacker Crown
description: Gain a Hacker Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a LeBlanc.

name: Mascot Crown
description: Gain a Mascot Emblem, a Gargoyle Stoneplate, and a Malphite.

name: Ox Force Crown
description: Gain an Ox Force Emblem, a Titan's Resolve, and an Alistar.

name: Prankster Crown
description: Gain a Prankster Emblem, a Titan's Resolve, and a Gnar.

name: Recon Crown
description: Gain a Recon Emblem, a Recurve Bow, and an Ezreal.

name: Renegade Crown
description: Gain a Renegade Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Camille.

name: Star Guardian Crown
description: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem, a Tear of the Goddess, and a Nilah.

name: Aegis Crest
description: Gain an Aegis Emblem and a Vi.

name: Aegis Crown
description: Gain an Aegis Emblem, a Redemption, and an Alistar.

name: Anima Squad Crest
description: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem and a Sylas.

name: Anima Squad Crown
description: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem, a Tear of the Goddess, and a Riven.

name: Heart Crown
description: Gain a Heart Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and a Sona.

name: Absolute Corruption
description: Gain a Fiddlesticks. Combat start: Your strongest Fiddlesticks grants its nearest ally 30 Ability Power and allows them to share its Corrupted souls. Corrupted Souls are shared even if Fiddlesticks is no longer dormant.

name: Category Five
description: Gain a Janna. Your strongest Janna gains 10 Ability Power and her ability does True Damage.

name: They See Me Rolling
description: Gain a Nunu. Your strongest Nunu has 25 Ability Power and 20% movement speed.

name: Stacks on Stacks
description: Gain a Nasus. Your strongest Nasus has 20% Attack Damage, which increases permanently by 6% when he casts his Ability.

name: Get Paid
description: Gain a Gangplank. When you field him, your team has a 66% chance to gain 2 gold on kill.

name: League of Draven
description: Gain a Draven. Your strongest Draven has 25% bonus Attack Damage. When he kills an enemy, there is a 80% chance to gain 1 gold.

name: Daredevil
description: Gain a Samira. When you field her, your team gains 4.5% Attack Speed for each 2 Tactician Health missing.

name: Make It Rain
description: Gain a Miss Fortune. After every 3 player combats fielded, your strongest Miss Fortune drops 20-40 gold (based on current Stage).

name: Underground Soul
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Underground. Gain a Zz'Rot Portal and an Ezreal.

name: Raider's Spoils
description: Gain an Ezreal. Combat start: Your strongest Ezreal grants his nearest ally a temporary Artifact for the rest of combat.

name: Bigger, Better Buckler
description: Gain a Poppy. Combat start: Your strongest Poppy gains 180 Armor.

name: Get Paid
description: Gain a Gangplank. When you field him, your team has a 50% chance to gain 1 gold on kill.

name: Corps Focus
description: Gain an Ashe. When you field her, your team gains 15% Attack Speed, doubled while her Ability is active.

name: Growth Spurt
description: Gain a Lulu. When your strongest Lulu casts her Ability, she gains 100 bonus Health and 18 Ability Power (this can stack).

name: Flaming Ricochet
description: Gain a Gangplank. Your strongest Gangplank's Ability bounces to a second target, dealing 80% damage.

name: Make It Rain
description: Gain a Miss Fortune. After every 3 player combats fielded, your strongest Miss Fortune drops 8-20 gold (based on current Stage).

name: Cyclone
description: Gain a Wukong. Your strongest Wukong has 18 Ability Power and +1 hex Ability range.

name: Illuminating Singularity
description: Gain a Lux. Every 2nd cast, your strongest Lux's Ability deals 150% more damage.

name: Lucent Barrier
description: Gain a Lux. Combat start: Your strongest Lux grants her 2 nearest allies a 500 Health shield and 35 Ability Power.

name: Kingslayer
description: Gain a Sylas. Your strongest Sylas gains 25% maximum Health and deals 30% increased damage.

name: Petricite Chains
description: Gain a Sylas. When you field him, your strongest Sylas grants your team 30 starting Mana, and his Ability 35% Mana Reaves enemies.

name: Divine Ascent
description:
Gain a Kayle. Your strongest Kayle gains bonuses per star level:
1: 40% Attack Speed
2: And +3 Attack Range
3: And attacks fire 2 extra bolts that deal 50% damage

name: Righteous Range
description: Gain a Kayle. Combat start: Your strongest Kayle and her 2 nearest allies gain +2 Attack Range and 33% Attack Speed.

name: Dynamic Defenses
description: Gain a Blitzcrank and a Gargoyle Stoneplate. When your strongest Blitzcrank casts his Ability, its duration increases by 2 seconds per enemy targeting him.

name: Rocket Grab
description: Gain a Blitzcrank. Your strongest Blitzcrank has 400 bonus Health. Combat start: He pulls the farthest enemy and <TFTKeyword>Stuns</TFTKeyword> them for 1.5 seconds.

name: Brawler Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Brawler. Gain a Vi.

name: Supers Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Super. Gain a Malphite.

name: Supers Soul
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Super. Gain a Titan's Resolve and a Lee Sin.

name: Chronobreak
description: Gain an Ekko. When you field him, he <TFTKeyword>Stuns</TFTKeyword> all enemies for 2 seconds after 10 seconds of combat.

name: Bunny Mercenary
description: Gain a Miss Fortune. Your strongest Miss Fortune's Ability covers a wider cone. When she casts her ability,  she gains a 200 Health shield for 2 seconds.

name: Gadgeteen Crest
description: Gain a Gadgeteen Emblem and an Annie.

name: Gadgeteen Crown
description: Gain a Gadgeteen Emblem, a Negatron Cloak, and an Annie.

name: Partners in Crime
description: Gain a Viego. When you field him, your team gains 12% <TFTKeyword>Omnivamp</TFTKeyword>, tripled when 2 or less allies remain.

name: Extinction Event
description: Gain an Aurelion Sol. Your strongest Aurelion Sol has 15 Ability Power and his Ability's meteors are larger.

name: Heartstopper
description: Gain a Viego. Your strongest Viego has 10 Ability Power, and his Ability deals up to 50% increased damage based on the enemy's missing Health.

name: Style & Flair
description: Gain a Samira. Your strongest Samira has 30% Attack Damage. When she scores a takedown, she restores 30% of her maximum Mana.

name: Back for Blood
description: Gain a Bel'Veth. Your strongest Belveth has 25% <TFTKeyword>Omnivamp</TFTKeyword>, tripled while under 50% Health.

name: Daredevil
description: Gain a Samira. When you field her, your team gains 3.5% Attack Speed for each 10 Tactician Health missing.

name: Deathbringer
description: Gain an Aatrox. Your strongest Aatrox's abilities deal additional damage equal to 15% of his Maximum Health.

name: Darkin Assimilation
description: Gain an Aatrox. When you field him, 40% of the damage your team recieves is instead dealt over 3 seconds as non-lethal damage.

name: Full Power to Sword
description: Gain a Garen. Your strongest Garen's ability costs 50 less Mana to cast and deals additional damage equal to 180% of his Attack Damage, but no longer stuns.

name: My Sword is Your Shield
description: Gain a Garen. Combat Start and when your strongest Garen casts his ability: Garen shields allies for 12% of their maximum health for 4 seconds.

name: Synchronous Plating
description: Gain a Gnar. Your strongest Gnar gains 45 Armor and Magic Resistance, plus another 5 until the end of combat every time he damages an enemy with his Ability.

name: Temper Tantrum
description: Gain a Gnar. When you field him, enemies take 10% more damage, increased to 20% the first time they are damaged by Gnar's attacks or Ability.

name: Rule of Four
description: Gain a Jhin. Every 4 takedowns your strongest Jhin gets each combat, he drops 6-12 gold (based on current Stage). He occasionally also drops an item component.

name: Rule of Four
description: Gain a Jhin. Every 4 takedowns your strongest Jhin gets each combat, he drops 2-4 gold (based on current Stage). He occasionally also drops an item component.

name: Wrath of the Rift
description: Gain a Jhin. When you field him, your units that start combat in the back 2 rows deal 16% bonus damage.

name: Hyperbolic Time Chamber
description: Gain a Lucian. The first time your strongest Lucian casts his Ability each combat, and every 2 times afterwards, gain 2 gold.

name: Hyperbolic Time Chamber
description: Gain a Lucian. The first time your strongest Lucian casts his Ability each combat, and every 3 times afterwards, gain 2 experience point.

name: Fear is Freedom
description: Gain a Morgana. Your strongest Morgana sends out 1 additional Dark Binding(s) when she casts her Ability, and her Dark Bindings stun their targets for 1 additional second(s).

name: Gas Giant Slayer
description: Gain a Morgana. When you field her, your team's abilities and attacks deal 30% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

name: Easy Being Green
description: Gain a Neeko and a Spear of Shojin. When you field her, allies holding Spear of Shojin gain 35% Ability Power.

name: Starlight Resonance
description: Gain a Neeko. On combat start and when your strongest Neeko casts her Ability, she grants herself and her closest ally 15 Ability Power until the end of combat.

name: The Best Offense
description: Gain a Pantheon. Your strongest Pantheon gains 40 Ability Power and 100 Magic Resistance.

name: Chronic Hallucinations
description: Gain a Pantheon. Combat start: Your strongest Pantheon and his 4 nearest allies take 60% reduced damage for 6 seconds.

name: Your Cut
description: Gain a Pyke. After player combat rounds, gain 1 free Shop refresh(es), plus 1 free Shop refresh(es) for every 2 time(s) your strongest Pyke cast his Ability last round.

name: Small Game Hunter
description: Gain a Pyke. When you field him, your team's abilities and attacks deal 10% more damage, increased to 25% against enemies with less than 1400 maximum Health.

name: Time Knife
description: Gain a Shen. Your strongest Shen's spell costs 10 less Mana, and after casting his spell, his next 3 attack(s) deal bonus true damage equal to 250% of his Armor.

name: Recursion Matrix
description: Gain a Shen. When you field him, your team takes 7% reduced damage, tripled for 4 seconds when they cast Abilities.

name: Time and a Half
description: Gain a Sivir. After player combats, gain 1 gold for every 42 Attack Damage your strongest Sivir has.

name: Time and a Half
description: Gain a Sivir. After player combats, gain 2 gold for every 42 Attack Damage your strongest Sivir has.

name: Ante Up
description: Gain a Twisted Fate. Your strongest Twisted Fate drops 2 gold every 20-10 cards thrown each combat (based on current Stage).

name: Ante Up
description: Gain a Twisted Fate. Your strongest Twisted Fate drops 1 gold every 20-10 cards thrown each combat (based on current Stage).

name: Gear Shift
description: Gain a Twisted Fate. When you field him, your team gains 12% Attack Speed, doubled after they cast their Ability the first time each combat.

name: Joy Siphon
description: Gain a Vex. Your strongest Vex heals the 2 lowest health units on your team for 30% of the damage she deals.

name: Endless Darkness
description: Gain a Vex. When you field her, your team gains 20 Ability Power, and 5 when they cast Abilities (this can stack).

name: Big Data
description: Gain a Warwick. When you field him, your units deal 0.65% increased damage for every 100 Health they have.

name: Well Fed+
description: Gain a Warwick. When you field him your team gains 230 Maximum Health. This is increased by 2 every 2 times your strongest Warwick attacks. (Current Health: ?)

name: Well Fed+
description: Gain a Warwick. When you field him your team gains 150 Maximum Health. This is increased by 1 every 2 times your strongest Warwick attacks. (Current Health: ?)

name: Enchanted Ammunition
description: Gain a Lucian. When you field him, your team gains 20 Ability Power, and 1 when they attack (this can stack).

name: Well Fed
description: Gain a Warwick. When you field him your team gains 60 Maximum Health. This is increased by 1 every 3 times your strongest Warwick attacks. (Current Health: ?)

name: Well Fed
description: Gain a Warwick. When you field him your team gains 50 Maximum Health. This is increased by 2 every 2 times your strongest Warwick attacks. (Current Health: ?)

name: Temporal Disruption
description: Gain an Ultimate Ezreal. Your strongest Ezreal's Abilities cause enemies struck to burn for 2% of their Health every second and have their healing reduced by 33% for the rest of combat.

name: Accelerated Mentorship
description: Gain an Ultimate Ezreal. After player combat rounds where you fielded him, gain 8 experience points.

name: Accelerated Mentorship
description: Gain an Ultimate Ezreal. After player combat rounds where you fielded him, gain 16 gold.

name: Salvage Bin+
description: Gain a random completed item now, and a component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

name: InfiniTeam Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional InfiniTeam. Gain a Sivir.

name: InfiniTeam Crest
description: Gain an InfiniTeam Emblem and a Sivir.

name: InfiniTeam Crown
description: Gain an InfiniTeam Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Sivir.

name: Quickdraw Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Quickdraw. Gain an Ezreal.

name: Quickdraw Soul
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Quickdraw. Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet and an Ezreal.

name: Riftwalker Crest
description: Gain a Riftwalker Emblem and 2 gold.

name: Riftwalker Crown
description: Gain a Riftwalker Emblem, a Sparring Gloves, and a Pyke.

name: Mana Tempering
description: Gain a Sivir. When you field her, your team gains 20% Attack Damage, and 5% when they cast Abilities (this can stack).

name: Winds of the Wanderer
description: Gain a Yasuo. Your strongest Yasuo's spell is larger and does 8% increased damage.

name: Grandmaster's Training
description: Gain a Jax. When you field him your team gains 12 Armor and 20% Attack speed. When your strongest Jax dies these effects are doubled for the rest of combat.

name: LaserCorps Crest
description: Gain an LaserCorps Emblem and a Yasuo.

name: LaserCorps Soul
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional LaserCorps. Gain a Hand of Justice and a Yasuo.
